Solution/insight to positioning-anomaly problem
- Render should be provided pl_posx,y (without center offsets) for image positioning
which is the upper-left corner of the tile, which is currently the case
- The movement updates should be made using pl_center_x,y coordinates which are 
actually the center of the tile
